item.title: Facebook Derangement Syndrom and Libra
item.description: Have you heard? Facebook is coming out with a new cryptocurrency that’s going to usher in a dystopian corporate nightmare and usurp governments around the world? LOLOLOLOL The Facebook Libra project was announced a few weeks ago but itâ€™s already causing waves in some circles. Below are some objections. Libra will take money and sell IOUs for some future money. Yes, this also happens when Amazon (or any business) sells you a gift card.
